pages.text: The Soul of Colossus provides a 5x to health, and negates all negative effects.  This will clash with the Force of Negative talismans.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_ultimate)Ultimate Talisman Base$(/l).  The soul is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:soul_of_dimensions)Soul of Dimensions$(/l).
The items to craft this can be obtained by looting chests in a Fargo's Dungeon.
